content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of bureaucratic rulemaking?

choices.label: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) collecting back taxes with interest from citizens
The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) writing a regulation to support a clean water bill
Congress passing legislation to establish the Department of Homeland Security
The federal government listing a business opportunity on its clearinghouse Web site for government contracts

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
